author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Fixes #2592 

When Resolve method is not able to find the assembly, we try to look it up from GAC.
If found, the assembly is loaded and cached.
There is a TestHook to disable GAC loading, but it is enabled by default.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Rebasing did not get rid of the changes in test unrelated to this commit.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan if you click the TestCases tab, the test failure is your new test loading PSScheduledJob module.  The other error output isn't fatal and fixed by https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/3968

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Having a look at the test failure.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT  All comments / issues fixed. Please have a look.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @daxian-dbw  Can you also have a look. Thanks!

title: Added logic in AssemblyLoadContext to load assembly from GAC.
